sentences.en: A nimble mind backed by a degree in economics gave him a firm grasp of financial matters.
sentences.cn: 机敏的头脑再加上经济学学位作后盾使他对金融问题把握非常准。

sentences.en: Elderly people are told that if they want to keep their minds nimble, they must use them.
sentences.cn: 老年人被告知，要想保持头脑灵敏，就必须要多动脑。

sentences.en: Everything had been stitched by Molly's nimble fingers.
sentences.cn: 每一件东西都是莫莉灵巧的双手缝制出来的。

sentences.en: He was a nimble-footed boy of ten.
sentences.cn: 他是个步伐敏捷的10岁男孩。

sentences.en: I was very nimble at my work.
Jack was nimble and made the best of what start he had.
sentences.cn: 杰克凭着身子灵巧,又先跑了一步.

sentences.en: The boy was nimble and jumped clear of the truck.
sentences.cn: 男孩很灵巧,纵身一跳就避开了卡车.

sentences.en: The morning was fine, the air nimble, brisk.
sentences.cn: 早上天气很晴朗, 空气又清新又凉爽.

sentences.en: The nimble hero, skipped into a chapel that stood near.
sentences.cn: 敏捷的英雄跳进近旁的一座小教堂里.

sentences.en: The nurse sewed up the wound with nimble fingers.
sentences.cn: 护士用灵巧的手指缝好了伤口.

sentences.en: They were so nimble it was almost impossible to hit them.
sentences.cn: 它们行动轻捷,几乎无法把它们击中.

sentences.en: Val, who was light and nimble on her feet, learnt to dance the tango.
sentences.cn: 脚步轻盈灵活的瓦尔学会了跳探戈舞。

sentences.en: You need nimble fingers for that job.

trans.tran_cn: 灵活的，敏捷的，（头脑）思路敏捷的，机智的，机敏的
trans.tran_en: able to move quickly and easily with light neat movements
